transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000558401.6. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000648006.1. The two transcripts differ at the 3'UTR.
